posts.post_content:
Three beautiful photos are possibly for sale.  Testing market on each and if I get an interesting offer I will sale.

1) 1923-24 Santa Clara Team Photo (Oscar Charleston) - originally from Hakes Auction #204, Item #1272

2) 1926 Cuban League Team Postcard (Martin Dihigo / Jud Wilson) - originally from Hakes

3) 1916 Chicago American Panorama Photo (Llyod / Hill / Foster) - originally from REA

Scans or Photos please?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Patrick (hi Pat) sent a few over pics to me but they are very small. I will vouch for Patrick after knowing him for around 20 yrs....
